sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>Users appear in ServiceNow as active. and Disabled when moved to disabled state in LDAP</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category display_value="LDAP">f099e2434f2ce3007e72aa95d310c717</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>Set the filter based on infromation provided by GB3 to pull the users into ServiceNow</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 02:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001041</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Set the LDAP pull rule for Users</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-19 11:32:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6a3eae434f2ce3007e72aa95d310c7c9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>rachel.rowlandson@gb3.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 20:40:14</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
